content:
IServiceProxy IServiceProxy Interface

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Remoting.Client
Assembly:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.dll

This is the base Client side interface for Remoting. The framework provides the Remoting infrastructure for all the service contracts inheriting from IService through ServiceRemotingListener and ServiceProxy.

Edit

In this Article

public interface IServiceProxyPublic Interface IServiceProxy

Properties

ServiceInterfaceType ServiceInterfaceType

Edit

The interface type that is being remoted.

Type ServiceInterfaceType { get; }ReadOnly Property ServiceInterfaceType As Type
Value
Type Type

Service interface type

ServicePartitionClient ServicePartitionClient

Edit

The service partition client used to send requests to the service.

IServiceRemotingPartitionClient ServicePartitionClient { get; }ReadOnly Property ServicePartitionClient As IServiceRemotingPartitionClient
Value
IServiceRemotingPartitionClient IServiceRemotingPartitionClient

ServicePartitionClient used by the ServiceProxy
